law.text: KRS 383.505 to 383.715 being a general act intended as a unified coverage of its subject matter, no part of it is to be construed as impliedly repealed by subsequent legislation if that construction can reasonably be avoided.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 176, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 378, sec. 4.
